person_say: I’ve been procrastinating on my report and don’t know how to start. Are there any ways to improve my efficiency?
animal_say:
Buzz buzz! Let's uncover what's causing this delay. Bizy1, it's your time to shine!
little bizy:Bzz! It sounds like you have a Fear of Failure. Try breaking the report into smaller tasks to ease the pressure!

person_say: That's a good idea! Breaking it into smaller tasks sounds less overwhelming. I can focus on one thing at a time instead of stressing about the whole report!
animal_say: Buzz! That's a perfect plan! Focus on one task, and remember to celebrate each small victory!

person_say: Absolutely! Celebrating small victories will definitely help me stay motivated. I can reward myself with some music or doodling after completing each part!
animal_say: Buzz buzz! Music and doodling are great rewards! Keep that motivation flowing as you tackle your tasks!

person_say: Thank you! I really appreciate the encouragement. I'm feeling more motivated to get started now!
animal_say: Buzz buzz! I'm thrilled to hear that! Now, let's keep that momentum going!
